name: mikroe.click.hallcurrent17
short_description: Hall Current 17 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a precise solution for AC/DC current sensing. This board features the ACS37010, a high-accuracy current sensor from Allegro MicroSystems. The ACS37010 has a high operating bandwidth of 450kHz and a fast response time of 1.3Î¼s response time. It features a highly isolated compact surface-mount package, low internal primary conductor resistance, low sensitivity error, low offset voltage over temperature, and more.
